GuessGenius - The Ultimate Number Guessing Game to Sharpen Your Mind!

## Key Features:

‚Ä¢ Diverse Hint System: Receive clues to get closer to the answer
‚Ä¢ Dynamic Scoring: Based on speed and accuracy of your guesses
‚Ä¢ Sleek Graphics: Enjoy a visually appealing gaming experience
‚Ä¢ Sound Effects: Immerse yourself with realistic audio feedback
‚Ä¢ Personal Best Tracker: Monitor your progress and strive to surpass your records
‚Ä¢ Free to Play: Endless fun without any cost

## Perfect for:

‚Ä¢ Puzzle and mind game enthusiasts
‚Ä¢ Students looking to enhance their numerical skills
‚Ä¢ Anyone seeking a quick mental break during browsing sessions

## How to use:

1. Click the GuessGenius icon in your Chrome toolbar
2. Press the 'Start Game' button on the main screen
3. Enter your guess using the on-screen number pad
4. Use hints wisely by clicking the 'Hint' button
5. Try to guess the number in as few attempts as possible
6. Beat your high score and challenge yourself to improve

Take a break from your browsing and prove you're a true Genius! Add GuessGenius to Chrome now!

## Privacy & Permissions:

GuessGenius respects your privacy. This extension does not collect or store any personal data. It only requires permissions to display the game interface when the extension icon is clicked.
